pkgmetadata.longdescription: mhcnames========All the fun and adventure of MHC nomenclature, now in PythonExample-------.. code:: python In [1]: mhcnames.parse_allele_name("HLA-A0201") Out[1]: AlleleName(species='HLA', gene='A', allele_family='02', allele_code='01') In [2]: mhcnames.compact_allele_name("HLA-A*02:01") Out[2]: 'A0201'
